section.text: *NOTE: This section was created by emergency legislation that will expire on April 5, 2022.*
section.heading: Tolling of tenant deadlines.
section.text: The running of the time periods under §§ 42-3404.10(1) and 42-3404.11(1) for tenants and tenant groups to submit a written statement of interest and tenant organizations to register to exercise rights and the time periods under §§ 42-3404.10(2) and 42-3404.11(2) for tenants and tenant organizations to negotiate a contract of sale shall be tolled from January 5, 2022, through February 15, 2022.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 days) amendment of this section, see § 3 of Foreclosure Moratorium Extension Emergency Amendment Act of 2022 (D.C. Act 24-320, Feb. 3, 2022, 0 DCR 0).
